cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13)
project(FileWatcher)

add_library(FileWatcher)
target_sources(FileWatcher PRIVATE sources/FileWatcher.cpp)
set_target_properties(FileWatcher PROPERTIES CXX_STANDARD 11 CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON)
target_include_directories(FileWatcher PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/")
if (WIN32)
    target_sources(FileWatcher PRIVATE sources/FileWatcherWin32.cpp)
elseif (UNIX AND NOT APPLE)
    target_sources(FileWatcher PRIVATE sources/FileWatcherLinux.cpp)
elseif (UNIX AND APPLE)
    target_sources(FileWatcher PRIVATE sources/FileWatcherOSX.cpp)
endif()
